original_text: We have received God's own Spirit, not a spirit that belongs to this world. As a result, we can understand all the good things that God has given to us. We have received God's own Spirit, not a spirit that belongs to this world. As a result, we can understand all the good things that God has given to us.
korean_text: 우리가 세상의 영을 받지 아니하고 오직 하나님으로부터 온 영을 받았으니 이는 우리로 하여금 하나님께서 우리에게 은혜로 주신 것들을 알게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: We have received God's own Spirit
not a spirit that belongs to this world
we can understand all the good things
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 모든 좋은 것들을 이해할 수 있다

sentences.original_text: that God has given to us
